experiment_overview.primary_goal: Honest evaluation of LLM numerical and analytical capabilities
experiment_overview.dataset: Sample_CNC CNC Machine Data (113,855 records, 6 columns)

Enhanced (Semantic Understanding).method: Semantic understanding + contextual analysis + relaxed numerical proximity

Superior (Notebook 7 Multi-Strategy).method: Multi-strategy extraction + progressive scoring + confidence weighting

key_insights: Validation method evolution shows 56.4% improvement from Enhanced (Semantic Understanding) to Superior (Notebook 7 Multi-Strategy)
Best performing validation: Superior (Notebook 7 Multi-Strategy) with 0.809 average score
Multi-strategy extraction (Notebook 7 approach) provides most accurate numerical validation
Best prompt approach across all validations: ENHANCED with 0.877 score
Enhanced prompt engineering shows consistent improvements across validation methods
LLM models excel at semantic understanding and contextual analysis
scientific_conclusions: Fake validation (dummy values) severely overestimates model capabilities
Real ground truth validation provides honest but overly strict evaluation
Enhanced semantic validation captures true analytical strengths of LLMs
Superior validation with multi-strategy extraction offers most comprehensive assessment
Prompt engineering approach (Basic → Expert → Enhanced) shows clear performance improvements
LLM models demonstrate strong reasoning and semantic understanding capabilities
Numerical accuracy depends heavily on extraction strategy and tolerance levels
Context-aware validation provides more realistic performance assessment than strict numerical matching

recommendations.recommendation: Use Superior validation (Notebook 7 approach) for comprehensive LLM evaluation
recommendations.rationale: Provides most accurate and fair assessment of both numerical and analytical capabilities

recommendations.recommendation: Implement Enhanced semantic validation for balanced evaluation
recommendations.rationale: Good balance between accuracy and implementation complexity

recommendations.recommendation: Use Real ground truth validation for baseline assessment
recommendations.rationale: Honest evaluation without complex extraction logic

recommendations.recommendation: Use Enhanced prompt approach with rich context and operation-specific optimization
recommendations.rationale: Consistently best performing across all validation methods

recommendations.recommendation: Implement multi-strategy number extraction with German language support
recommendations.rationale: Significantly improves numerical accuracy and extraction confidence
